events.description: Events planned all through the New Year and into January and February.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Black Diablos Appearance
events.description: Black Diablos is making a comeback! All hunters HR 11 and above will be able to encounter it in desert habitats.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - More Monsters Everywhere
events.description: Monsters in all habitats will reappear in shorter intervals and in higher numbers than usual.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Pink Rathian Appearance
events.description: Pink Rathian is making a comeback! All hunters HR 11 and above will be able to encounter it in forest habitats.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Boosted Zinogre Appearance
events.description: The appearance rate of Zinogre as the fifth monster at Hunt-a-thon Points will be boosted for all hunters HR 11 and above.

Zinogre will be the guaranteed fifth monster in all Hunt-a-thons. Completing exclusive Event Quests during this time will reward you with a new Hunter Medal. Zinogre will still appear in Hunt-a-thons after December 17, but at its usual rate.

Major update introducing two new weapon types (Dual Blades and Lances), four new large monsters (Radobaan, Banbaro, Barioth, and Zinogre), a new sleep element, and a new hunting experience called Hunt-a-thons. The habitats have been updated with a winter theme and two new small monsters (Wulg and Cortos) have been added.
A limited-time in-game event to celebrate Monster Hunter Now's nomination for Best Mobile Game at The Game Awards. More details to be announced.

Qualily has been busy continuing her investigation into the anomalies and she needs your help again! She’s back with more investigation requests for you—10 of them in total. Can she count on you to help slay monsters and investigate gathering points? Rewards this time will include Carpenterbugs, Monster Bone+, and other materials such as Dragonite Ore! Ready your equipment and prepare to investigate!
Major update introducing new monsters, weapon types, and Hunt-a-thons. The field will be lightly snow-covered to match the monsters that will be appearing.
